mapper.select: SELECT id, userno, cateno, title, content, createDate, updateDate, view, good FROM qanda
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qanda (userno, cateno, title, content, createDate, updateDate, view, good) VALUES (#{userno}, #{cateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{view}, #{good})
mapper.update: UPDATE qanda SET userno = #{userno}, cateno = #{cateno}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, createDate = #{createDate}, updateDate = #{updateDate}, view = #{view}, good = #{good} WHERE id = #{id}
